name: Re:Ro
description:
We blame ourselves for almost every mistake. Even a seemingly insignificant one.

Mushlik, a funny little creature, is very afraid of Mistakes. He aspires to a Dream, but there are more and more obstacles in his way. Will you help him?

The track is drawn with the mouse (hold down the left button and drive), the Mushlik rolls along it. The task is to circumvent all obstacles on the way to success.

Small game for the wrong biennale nº5.
http://repetitions.xyz/
